agent

Class InitialInputRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Agent
      • agent.InitialInputRecorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    reactor.fn.Consumer<reactor.bus.Event<ParserMessageJSON>>

    @Component
public class InitialInputRecorder
extends Agent
    UserInitialInputRecorder: handle user initial input. State mapping: 0 - ask age 1 - ask gender 2 - ask weight 3 - ask height 4 - ask desiredWeight 5 - ask goalDate 6 - store user info
